overview: Billionaire Mark Reeves (Mark Davis) has everything money can buy... except LOVE. During a business trip to Mexico, he finds himself negotiating opposite the devastatingly beautiful, articulate and clever, Silvia Cabrera (Silvia Saint). His infatuation devours his senses... he must know more about the one woman who can complete him! In a covert investigation into Silvia's personal and professional life, Reeves discovers more about Silvia than even she is aware!
tagline: Her Appetite is Insatiable in the Corporate World ... and in Bed!
title: Devoured
